LanguageData.AI_ProstheticBodyLimitTooltip: Minimum body size allowed for prosthetic body implants. Any animal below this body size can't receive these implants.
LanguageData.AI_BionicBodyLimitTooltip: Minimum body size allowed for bionic body implants. Any animal below this body size can't receive these implants.
LanguageData.AI_ArchotechBodyLimitTooltip: Minimum body size allowed for archotech body implants. Any animal below this body size can't receive these implants.
